name: Scare Your Pants Off
description:
You have an oblivious monocled, moustachioed, aristocrat, “Sir”, going about his day in various rooms throughout his manor.  There are ghosts who want to scare him to death!

You are a friendly poltergeist throwing things in the manor at the ghosts to drive them away.

Sir is blissfully unaware of the war waging around him. If he gets hit, he loses an article of clothing. When he’s down to his top hat and underwear, the next hit will scare him to death.

Gameplay is simple. Click on items in the room and drag them away from your target to fling them at the those pesky spooks.

Built with Godot - WebGL may not work on some browsers.
